explains: adj. 重生的；信仰再生的

sentences.en: As a "born-again" cyclist I had decided that this season I would ride in a few races.
sentences.cn: 作为一个“重生”的自行车运动员，我已经决定这个赛季我要参加几个比赛。

sentences.en: You describe yourself as a born-again carnivore.
sentences.cn: 你把自己描述成重生的食肉动物。

sentences.en: In this born-again world no one was older than 6.
sentences.cn: 这个重获新生的群体中，没有人超过6岁。
